en.title: Dai Pengjun actively cleaned up and won the dormitory pacesetter
en.content: Dai Pengjun not only took the initiative to clean the dormitory, but also led the students of the entire dormitory building to participate in the cleaning activities. His behavior was highly praised by his teachers and classmates, and he was finally named a "dormitory hygiene model" and became a role model for the whole school.

en.title: Website building！
en.content: The official website of 321 Dormitory was established and deployed on Github pages

zh.title: 戴鹏军同学积极打扫卫生，获得宿舍标兵
zh.content: 戴鹏军同学不仅积极主动地打扫宿舍卫生，还带动了整个宿舍楼的同学们一起参与清洁活动。他的行为得到了老师和同学们的高度赞扬，最终被评为“宿舍卫生标兵”，成为了全校学习的榜样。

zh.title: 网站建立！
zh.content: 321宿舍官网建立，部署在了Github pages
